result.markdown: --- title: "NASA Cloud Hackathon" description: | Transitioning Earthdata Workflows to the Cloud author: - name: NASA Openscapes url: {} date: 2021-11-15 categories: - event - workshop - nasa-framework image: "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2915555/133525653-2a2278b1-1015-4350-b2a5-160d125aaaf7.png" --- **Cloud Hackathon: Transitioning Earthdata Workflows to the Cloud,** co-hosted by the NASA EOSDIS Physical Oceanography Distributed Active Archive Center ([PO.DAAC](https://podaac.jpl.nasa.gov/)), National Snow and Ice Data Center DAAC ([NSIDC DAAC](https://nsidc.org/daac)), Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center ([LP.DAAC](https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/)), with support provided by [ASDC DAAC](https://asdc.larc.nasa.gov/), [GES DISC](https://disc.gsfc.nasa.gov/), [IMPACT](https://impact.earthdata.nasa.gov/) and [NASA Openscapes](https://nasa-openscapes.github.io/). **Blog summaries**: - - ![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2915555/133525653-2a2278b1-1015-4350-b2a5-160d125aaaf7.png){width="45%" fig-align="center"} The Cloud Hackathon will take place **virtually** from **November 15-19, 2021.** Please see **** for all details.
